channel.title: scheme on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily
channel.description: Recent content in scheme on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily

item.title: MP Police ASI & Subedar Stenographer Exam Date 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh Police Headquarters has announced 500 vacancies for Subedar (Stenographer) and Assistant Sub Inspector (Clerk) posts under direct and departmental recruitment. Eligible candidates with 12th pass and computer proficiency (CPCT/Hindi Typing) can apply online via MPESB from 03 October to 17 October 2025. The written exam will start on 10 December 2025. Reservation benefits and age relaxation are applicable only for MP domicile candidates.

item.title: MP Police Subedar & Sub Inspector Exam Date 2025
item.description: The MP Police Subedar & Sub Inspector Recruitment 2025 offers over 500 vacancies for male and female candidates under the Madhya Pradesh Police Department. The online application starts on 27 October 2025 and ends on 10 November 2025. Applicants must be graduates, meet the prescribed age and physical standards, and pay an online fee of ₹500 (UR) or ₹250 (reserved). The written exam begins on 9 January 2026, followed by PET and document verification.

item.title: MPESB Group-2 Sub Group-3 Exam Date 2025
item.description: The MPESB has announced Group-2 Sub Group-3 Recruitment 2025 for a total of 339 posts in multiple departments including Food, Dairy, Medical, Municipal Corporations, and Pollution Control Board. The online application process is open for eligible candidates, with different qualifications required depending on the post. Interested applicants can check the detailed notification for eligibility, age limit, fees, and post-wise vacancy before applying online.

item.title: MPESB Paramedical Result 2025 Declared
item.description: MP Employees Selection Board (MPESB) has announced the Paramedical Recruitment 2025 for a total of 464 posts. The recruitment includes vacancies for Physiotherapist, Counselor, Pharmacist Grade-II, and Ophthalmic Assistant. Eligible candidates can apply online from 28 July 2025 to 11 August 2025 through the official portal esb.mp.gov.in. The selection will be based on an online examination scheduled to begin from 27 September 2025. Candidates are advised to check the post-wise qualifications, age limit, and other details before applying.

item.title: MP Gram Panchayat Sachiv Bharti 2025-26
item.description: MP Gram Panchayat Sachiv Bharti 2026 के तहत मध्यप्रदेश में कुल 23,011 ग्राम पंचायत सचिव पदों पर भर्ती प्रस्तावित है। योग्यता के लिए Graduation + Computer Diploma (DCA/PGDCA) और आयु 21 से 35 वर्ष निर्धारित की जा सकती है। चयन प्रक्रिया MPESB की लिखित परीक्षा, मेरिट सूची और दस्तावेज सत्यापन के आधार पर होगी। नियुक्ति जिला पंचायत द्वारा की जाएगी और वेतनमान प्रशिक्षण अवधि में ₹10,000 से शुरू होकर नियमित सेवा में ₹19,500–₹52,000 प्रति माह तक रहेगा। आवेदन और परीक्षा की तिथि आधिकारिक नोटिफिकेशन जारी होने के बाद अपडेट की जाएगी।

item.title: MPPGCL Assistant & Junior Engineer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Power Generating Company Limited (MPPGCL) has released the Phase-II Recruitment 2025-26 notification for 131 posts of Assistant Engineer, Junior Engineer, Chemist, and Office Assistant. Eligible candidates can apply online from 17 October 2025 to 15 November 2025 through the MPOnline portal at https://chayan.mponline.gov.in. Selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test (CBT) followed by document verification. Candidates must hold the prescribed qualifications (BE/B.Tech/Diploma/M.Sc/12th + Computer Diploma) as per post. This recruitment offers a great opportunity for technical and administrative aspirants in the MP Power sector under a government enterprise.

item.title: MPPSC Deputy Director & Principal Grade-II Vacancy 2025
item.description: The MPPSC Technical Recruitment 2025 invites applications for the posts of Deputy Director, Principal Grade-II, and Assistant Director (Technical). Candidates with an engineering degree and the required professional experience can apply online from 01 December to 31 December 2025. The recruitment includes a correction window from 09 December 2025 to 02 January 2026. Applicants will be selected through a written examination followed by document verification. Interested candidates should carefully read the official notification before submitting the online form.

item.title: MPESB MP Police Constable Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh Professional Examination Board (MPESB) has announced the MP Police Constable Recruitment 2025 for a total of 7500 Constable (General Duty – SAF & DEF) posts. The online application process will start from 15/09/2025 and remain open till 29/09/2025, while the correction window will be available up to 04/10/2025. The written examination is scheduled to begin from 30/10/2025. Candidates applying for this recruitment must have passed 10th/12th (for UR/SC/OBC/EWS) or at least 8th standard (for ST candidates) from a recognized board. The minimum age limit is 18 years and the maximum is 33 years for general category male candidates, with age relaxations applicable for reserved categories and women as per rules. The application fee is ₹500 for UR, ₹250 for SC/ST/OBC/EWS (MP domicile), while departmental candidates need to pay ₹200 (UR) or ₹100 (reserved categories) along with applicable portal charges. This recruitment offers a great opportunity for candidates seeking a stable government job in the Madhya Pradesh Police Department.

item.title: MPPSC Food Safety Officer Exam Date 2025
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Public Service Commission (MPPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Food Safety Officer (FSO) with a total of 67 vacancies. The application process will be conducted online, and the job location is Madhya Pradesh. Candidates from all over India are eligible to apply, but those from other states will be treated as General (UR) category and will not receive any reservation or fee relaxation. Applicants must hold a Bachelor’s, Master’s, or Ph.D. degree in Food Technology, Agriculture, Biotechnology, Chemistry, Veterinary Science, Medicine, or a related field, or possess an equivalent qualification recognized by the Central Government. The age limit is 21 to 40 years, with age relaxation applicable as per rules for reserved categories. For complete details and to apply, visit the official website mppsc.mp.gov.in.

item.title: MPPSC System Analyst Programmer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Public Service Commission (MPPSC) has released Advertisement No. 07/2025 for recruitment to System Analyst, Programmer, and Assistant Programmer posts. A total of 04 vacancies are available for candidates with B.E./B.Tech, M.Sc. (CS/IT), MCA, BCA, or PGDCA qualifications. Eligible candidates can apply online from 31 October 2025 to 30 November 2025 through the official website mppsc.mp.gov.in.

item.title: MPPSC Assistant Professor (Computer Science) Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh Public Service Commission (MPPSC) has released the official notification for the Assistant Professor (Computer Science) Exam 2025 under the Higher Education Department. A total of 87 vacancies are available, including reserved seats for SC, ST, OBC, EWS, and PwD categories. Eligible candidates must hold a Master’s degree (M.Sc, M.Tech, M.E, or MCA) with at least 55% marks and have qualified NET/SET/SLET or possess a Ph.D. as per UGC norms. The online application process runs from 31/10/2025 to 30/11/2025, and the exam is scheduled for 04/01/2026. The selection process includes a written test followed by an interview.

item.title: MPHC Data Processing Assistant Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh High Court (MPHC) has announced the Data Processing Assistant (DPA) Recruitment 2025 under advertisement S2A/Exam/DPA/2025 for 41 vacancies. Eligible candidates with a BCA or B.Sc. (Computer Science/IT) degree and at least 60% marks, along with 3 years of data entry experience, can apply online from 29/10/2025 to 19/11/2025 through mphc.gov.in. The selection process includes a Preliminary Exam, Practical Test, and Interview, and the final merit will be based on Practical and Interview marks. The pay scale is ₹5200–20200 + Grade Pay ₹2400, and the application fees are ₹943.40 for UR and ₹743.40 for Reserved categories.

item.title: MPPGCL Various Posts Exam Date Out 2025
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Power Generating Company Limited (MPPGCL) has released a recruitment notification for 346 vacancies across various posts including Assistant Engineer, Junior Engineer, Plant Assistant, Office Assistant, Stenographer, Fireman, Security Guard, and more. Candidates can apply online through the MPOnline portal from 23rd July 2025 to 21st August 2025. The selection process will be based on Computer Based Test (CBT), followed by Physical Test (for selected posts like Security Guard and Fireman) and Document Verification. Category-wise reservation is applicable only for the domicile candidates of Madhya Pradesh. Candidates from other states will be treated under the Unreserved (UR) category.

item.title: MPESB Primary School Teacher Selection Test 2025 Answer Key Out
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Employees Selection Board (MPESB) has released the notification for the Primary School Teacher Selection Test 2025. A total of 10,150 Varg 3 Primary Teacher posts will be recruited under the School Education Department. Eligible candidates who have qualified the MP Primary TET 2020 or 2024 can apply online. Applicants must check the detailed eligibility, age limit, and other conditions in the official notification before applying. Candidates from outside MP can also apply but will not get any domicile reservation or relaxation benefits.

item.title: MPESB Middle and Primary School Teacher Selection Test - 2024 Result
item.description: प्रवेश पत्र डाउनलोड करें

item.title: MP Anganwadi Recruitment 2025 – Provisional Merit List
item.description: MP आंगनवाड़ी भर्ती 2025 के अंतर्गत महिला एवं बाल विकास विभाग, मध्यप्रदेश सरकार द्वारा आंगनवाड़ी कार्यकर्ता और सहायिका के पदों पर भर्ती की जा रही है। इस भर्ती के लिए केवल उसी वार्ड या ग्राम पंचायत की महिलाएं पात्र होंगी जहाँ पद रिक्त है। ग्राम क्षेत्र में नियुक्ति संबंधित ग्राम पंचायत की महिला से तथा नगरीय क्षेत्र में संबंधित वार्ड की महिला से की जाएगी। अन्य किसी ग्राम या वार्ड की महिला आवेदन के लिए पात्र नहीं मानी जाएगी। शैक्षणिक योग्यता के रूप में अभ्यर्थी का हायर सेकंडरी (12वीं पास) होना अनिवार्य है। यह भर्ती प्रक्रिया ऑनलाइन माध्यम से आयोजित की जाएगी और आवेदन केवल MPOnline पोर्टल के माध्यम से ही स्वीकार किए जाएंगे।

item.title: Damoh District Data Entry Operator Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Collector Office, Damoh (Madhya Pradesh) has released a notification for the recruitment of Office Assistant cum Data Entry Operator (Contractual). There is 1 vacancy, reserved for the Scheduled Caste (SC) category. Candidates must have passed 12th class, hold a valid CPCT score card, and possess typing proficiency in both Hindi and English. A minimum of 3 years of experience in MS Office and database software is required, along with skills in data feeding and document scanning. The applicant must be a domicile of Madhya Pradesh. The application process starts from 15 July 2025 and the last date to apply online via the MPOnline portal is 31 July 2025.

item.title: MPTRANSCO Various Post Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Power Transmission Company Limited (MPPTCL) has released a recruitment notification for 633 regular posts under the 2025–26 session. This recruitment is open only to the permanent residents of Madhya Pradesh. The available positions include Assistant Engineer (Transmission), Law Officer, Junior Engineer (Transmission and Civil), Line Attendant, and Substation Attendant. The application process is completely online, and the last date to apply is 4th August 2025. The selection will be based on a written examination followed by document verification. Educational qualifications, reservation rules, and other eligibility criteria will follow the Madhya Pradesh government norms. For detailed information and online application, candidates can visit the official website: www.mptransco.in.

item.title: MPESB Parvekshak Recruitment Test 2024 (Result)
item.description: MPESB ESB Released Parvekshak Sanchalnalay Mahila evam Bal vikash M.P. Bhopal Recruitment Test - 2024. Those candidates who are interested in this MP ESB Parvekshak Post Recruitment 2025 Examination can Apply Online

item.title: MPPSC Vehicle Transport Sub Inspector Recruitment 2025-Apply Online
item.description: MPPSC has released the Vehicle Transport Sub Inspector Recruitment 2025 notification. The recruitment aims to fill multiple SI posts under the Transport Department. Interested candidates can apply online through the official MPPSC website. The notification includes details about eligibility, age limit, application dates, and selection process.

item.title: MPHC Group D (Class IV) Jobs 2025 – Apply Now
item.description: MP High Court (MPHC) Class IV Group D Recruitment 2025 के तहत Peon, Sweeper, Driver आदि पदों के लिए आवेदन की प्रक्रिया 13 मई 2025 से शुरू होगी। उम्मीदवार 28 मई 2025 तक आवेदन कर सकते हैं। इस भर्ती में आवेदन शुल्क, आयु सीमा, चयन प्रक्रिया और वेतनमान समेत सभी महत्वपूर्ण जानकारी योज़ना पोर्टल पर उपलब्ध है।
